name: ChocolateyToolInstaller
description: Acquires the latest version of Chocolatey from the internet and adds it to the PATH (if not already installed). This task only works on Windows agents
helpMarkDown:
Runs the standard [Chocolatey installer](https://chocolatey.org/install) to install Chocolatey on the build agent.
Microsoft-hosted agents come with Chocolatey pre-installed, but self-hosted agents may not so this task ensures Chocolatey is always available for use.
author: David Gardiner

inputs.name: force
inputs.label: Force install
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set if you want to force installing Chocolatey
